tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE robot_performance_metrics (
    robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_name VARCHAR(255),
    performance_score FLOAT,
    battery_level INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE robot_errors (
    error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_id INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    error_message VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (robot_id) REFERENCES robot_metrics(robot_id)
);
